AliyunInvoiceVerifier.description: Verify Chinese VAT invoice authenticity via Aliyun API

invoiceCode.description: Invoice code (10-12 digits). Optional for digital invoices (type 31, 32).

invoiceNo.description: Invoice number (8-20 digits, varies by invoice type)

invoiceSum.description: Invoice amount. Depends on invoice type: type 01/03/20 enter amount excluding tax; type 15 enter vehicle price; type 31/32 enter amount including tax; blockchain invoice enter amount excluding tax.

verifyCode.description: Last 6 digits of verify code. Required for invoice type 04/10/11/14 and blockchain invoices.

invoiceKind.description: Select invoice kind. All parameters are required for blockchain invoices.

continueOnFail.description: Continue executing if invoice verification fails. Error information will be included in the output.
